name: crane
description: A Dimaond first Solidity development framework
author: cyotee <not_cyotee@proton.me>

scripts.generate-readme: asciidoctor -b html5 -a source-highlighter=highlight.js -a icons=font -a sectanchors -a sectlinks -a toc=left -a toclevels=3 -a github docs/README.adoc -o - | pandoc -f html -t gfm --wrap=none > README.md
